participant_1.background:
I am used to waking up early for work, but I prefer to sleep in on my days off.
I have a collection of lullabies that I sing to my baby.
I enjoy listening to Jason Mraz's music to help me cope with the loss of my parents.
I'd love to share some of my crochet patterns with you!
I spent my summer nights at the coffee shop, watching the stars.

participant_2.background:
I'm not a fan of Comic Con, but I do enjoy making organic cat food for my furry friend.
i am currently pregnant with my second child.
I want to show my music to the world!
I like a soft bed for my baby.
i have a missing pinky toe.

content.text: Hi there! What do you like to do on your days off?
I like to spend time with my family and my cat. I also like to make music.
Oh that's nice! I like to spend time with my baby and crochet. I also like to listen to music, especially Jason Mraz.
I love Jason Mraz too! I find his music to be very comforting.
I do too! His music helps me to cope with the loss of my parents.
I'm sorry to hear about that. I'm sure they would be proud of you for being such a good mother.
Thank you, that means a lot.
No problem! What do you like about crocheting?
I love that it's a creative outlet and that I can make things for my family and friends.
That's great! I'm not very creative, so I stick to making organic cat food for my furry friend.
That's so sweet! I'm sure your cat loves it.
He does! He's a very spoiled boy.
Haha, I'm sure he is.
So, what do you do for work?
I'm a stay-at-home mom, but I used to work as a nurse.
Oh, that's cool! I'm a stay-at-home mom too. I used to work as a musician.
Oh, that's awesome! What kind of music did you play?
I was a singer-songwriter. I used to play at local coffee shops and bars.
That's so cool! I wish I could sing.
You should try! It's a lot of fun.
Maybe I will!
You should! I'm sure you'd be great at it.
Thanks! I appreciate the encouragement.
No problem
